   "source": [
    "## Gaussian"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 1,
   "id": "29e6bde5-2411-4796-9e6a-60be38e784a4",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "import numpy as np\n",
    "import matplotlib.pyplot as plt\n",
    "x = np.arange(-10, 10, 0.01)\n",
    "\n",
    "\n",
    "from lamatrix import Gaussian"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 2,
   "id": "50091c10-21ba-4040-b1e1-efdd9e499153",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/html": [
       "<div>\\[f(\\mathbf{x}) = w_{0} \\frac{1}{\\sqrt{2\\pi\\sigma^2}} e^{-\\frac{\\mathbf{x} - \\mu^2}{2\\sigma^2}}\\]</div>"
      ],
      "text/plain": [
       "'\\\\[f(\\\\mathbf{x}) = w_{0} \\\\frac{1}{\\\\sqrt{2\\\\pi\\\\sigma^2}} e^{-\\\\frac{\\\\mathbf{x} - \\\\mu^2}{2\\\\sigma^2}}\\\\]'"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 2,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "Gaussian().equation"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 3,
   "id": "33a3df4a-5c2e-4865-a260-246cd96920ef",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "model = Gaussian('x', sigma=2, mu=1)\n",
    "w = np.random.uniform(0, 1, size=model.width)\n",
    "sample = model.design_matrix(x=x).dot(w)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 4,
   "id": "aa77219a-c233-4415-a2e8-1c4a1f7d2ea1",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "",
      "text/plain": [
       "<Figure size 640x480 with 1 Axes>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "fig, ax = plt.subplots()\n",
    "ax.plot(x, sample, c='k')\n",
    "ax.set(xlabel='$x$', ylabel='$y$', title='Gaussian model sample');"
   ]
  },
